title: Triathlon at the 2018 Commonwealth Games – Men's PTWC
text:
The men's PTWC <a href="triathlon">triathlon</a> was part of the <a href="Triathlon%20at%20the%202018%20Commonwealth%20Games">Triathlon at the 2018 Commonwealth Games</a> program. The competition was held on 7 April 2018 in the <a href="Southport%20Broadwater%20Parklands">Southport Broadwater Parklands</a>.
Competition format.
The race was held over the "sprint distance" and consisted of swimming, <a href="road%20bicycle%20racing">road bicycling</a>, and <a href="road%20running">road running</a>.
